thread.title: NRA Names Oliver North as Next President

author: Dan Frosch
title: NRA Names Oliver North as Next President

organizations.name: nra convention pull focus to school

text:
Retired Lt. Col. Oliver North is set to become the next president of the National Rifle Association, the group said Monday.
The announcement comes after the NRA set an attendance record this past weekend at its annual convention, with 87,154 people gathering in Dallas. President Donald Trump and Vice President Mike Pencespoke at the conference, as did Mr. North.
The... RELATED VIDEO Protests Outside NRA Convention Pull Focus to School Gun Violence While attendees inside the 2018 NRA Convention celebrated gun culture, outside the convention center in Dallas protesters on either side of the gun debate rallied.
